name: Slime Masters (itch)
description:
A small student project with a slime theme. Made for the OpenGameArt's Summer Game Jam 2022.  It took us around 3 weeks to make and we hope you will have fun! OUR TEAM

UI Designer: 
Ben131313 (Benoit Lemieux)

Level Designer: 
Patrick Faubert

Material Artist: 
Emerik Deschamps

Game Designer: 
Mab0r0shi (Jean-Michel Lafleur Lavoie)

Narrative Designers: 
Ben131313 (Benoit Lemieux) & Emerik Deschamps

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

WASD for movements
Left Mouse Button to throw one of your slimes
Right Mouse Button to fire your character projectile
